666270.name: Endure
666270.description:
Trapped in a world after an unknown epidemic brought the end of civilization, you fight off never ending waves of zombies. Try to stay alive as long as you can in this 1st person shooter. Do you have what it takes to Endure?
You are a soldier trapped in a town that is over run by zombies and zombie like creatures. You are armed with your rifle that will help you hold of the attacking zombies.
  • Endure is a single player FPS
  • It is a never-ending survial game where you will face off against infinite waves of enemies.
  • As you progress through the waves the enemies become more numerous and you will encounter different types of monsters to kill.
  • Endure features a creepy soundtrack that will put you in the mood of being in the zombie apocalypse.
